ceterms:description: Students applying for undergraduate admission in an associate (AA) program must provide the following:
ceterms:name: Brandman University - Undergraduate Admission for Associate's Program

ceterms:condition: High school diploma or GED equivalent
Official high school transcript indicating the date of graduation
Pass admissions test in English and Math
Successful completion of a transferable course to ENGU-103 or ENGU-104 (grade of C or higher) waives admissions test in English
Successful completion of a transferable course to MATU-103 or higher (grade of C or higher) waives admissions test in Math
ceterms:requires.ceterms:description: Students applying for undergraduate admission in an associate (AA) program with 0 - 11 transferable credits must provide the following:
ceterms:requires.ceterms:name: Brandman University - Undergraduate Admission in an Associate Program - 0 - 11 transferable credits:

ceterms:condition: Provide official transcripts from ALL colleges and universities attended. No admission exams or high school transcript are required.
ceterms:requires.ceterms:description: Students applying for undergraduate admission in an associate (AA) program with 12 or more transferable credits must provide the following:
ceterms:requires.ceterms:name: Brandman University - Undergraduate Admission in an Associate Program - 12 or more transferable credits:
